title: Manage your logins with the Firefox Password Manager
summary: Manage your saved logins and passwords on desktop Firefox with the built-in password management feature.
html:
Firefox includes a built-in password management feature. To manage your stored logins and passwords:

  1. Click the menu button to open the menu panel.
  2. Click Logins and PasswordsPasswords.

The Firefox about:logins page will open. From here, you'll be able to add or manage logins and passwords.

See Password Manager - Remember, delete and edit logins and passwords in Firefox for more information.
